data.comment: James Linington starts the match. Middlesbrough with the kick-off in London.
Henrik Dalsgaard for Brentford has been booked by James Linington and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Griffin Park.
It's Brentford with the kick-off after the break.
The home team replace Bryan Mbeumo with Marcus Forss.
In the minute 74, Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a second substitution, with Saman Ghoddos replacing Sergi Canos.
Neil Warnock (Middlesbrough) is making a first substitution, with Marvin Johnson replacing Hayden Coulson.
Tarique Fosu is replacing Vitaly Janelt for Brentford at Griffin Park.
In the minute 79, Britt Assombalonga is replacing Chuba Akpom for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
